Package model

Class DataAccess

java.lang.Object
model.DataAccess
public class DataAccess extends Object
Class DataAccess, which supplies several type of method to retrieve data from the database wineshop (this class prevents SQL injection attacks)
Version:
15.12.2022
Author:
Federico Brandini, Federico Putamorsi
